response.overview: When local Stalking resident Mike Stevens mysteriously vanishes, his friends Nate Cheech and Dylan Cruz lose hope of him coming back. A year later, a box is delivered to Nate containing a card and tapes. After believing Mike may still be out there, he, Dylan Cruz, and their new friend Jordan Brooks go searching. But what they didn’t know is that they’d find something much worse. The group is cursed and must defeat the evil spirit by luring it outside its realm and defeating it in our world.
response.title: The curse of stalking
